description: Display Just In Time Messages (JITMs) on admin pages.
author: Automattic

scripts.build: yarn install-if-deps-outdated && yarn clean && yarn build-js
scripts.build-production: yarn distclean && yarn install --production=false && yarn build-production-js
scripts.build-production-js: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production yarn build-js && yarn validate-es5 ./src/
